howItWorks.title: How does renting through our platform work?
content: Our peer-to-peer rental service is super easy:
- Create a free account
- Add your trailer with clear photos and description
- Set your own rental price and availability
- Receive requests and rent your trailer to other users
- Earn extra income with your idle trailer

safety.title: Safety & Insurance
content: Safety is our priority:
- Mandatory identification of all users
- Integrated rating and review system
- Optional additional insurance for renters
- Transparent communication between renter and rentee
- Guaranteed payment through our platform

benefits.title: Benefits for Renters
content: Why rent through our platform?
- Earn money with your idle trailer
- Full control over your rental terms
- Set flexible availability
- Meet new people and help the community
- Supportive customer service for questions

howToRent.title: How do I rent a trailer?
content: Renting a trailer is simple:
- Search by location or trailer type
- Compare prices and read reviews
- Book directly through our platform
- Pick up the trailer from the owner
- Use it for your project and return it

faq.moreQuestions: More questions? Feel free to contact us!
